xml.body:
@r315@
Co<>
Item that that letter th<>
I had yt of mr gard
can I not tell but th<>
of my lordes chaplen & that <>
my lord sayd that you shall byd you<>
good cher for yfe ther matters beryghte th<>
have fryndes in nov & yf my lord do ponesth<>
fully yt will be to his gret rebouke & hender
then I comm to mr Fort to oxfort & toldlyd hym <>
mylord deed saye & ther sayd the <>
he that ansur is good I nofe
but than he sayd that he had har
be fore and I aske of whom & he sayd<>
docter barbar & ther on I deed com hon<>
but master ford sayd thus I herd say that
my lord chancelar shold change hys offes
& that mr bacer sholde have yt
than sayd he I pray you reportyt nosuche thynges
on my word tel you shall here yt furder
notyfyed.
be me thomas callkot.
